#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int c=0,len,i,count,x,l;
	char str1[20],str2[20],*str;
	while(1)
	{
		cin>>str1>>str2;
		if((!strcmp(str1,"0"))&&(!strcmp(str2,"0")))
			break;
		c=0;
		count=0;
		if(strlen(str1)>=strlen(str2))
		{
			str=str1;
			len=strlen(str2);
			l=strlen(str1);
		}
		else
		{
			str=str2;
			len=strlen(str1);
			l=strlen(str2);
		}
		for(i=0;i<=len-1;i++)
		{
			x=(int)str1[strlen(str1)-i-1]+(int)str2[strlen(str2)-i-1]-96+c;
			if(x>9)
			{
				c=1;
				count++;
			}
			else
				c=0;
		}
		if(l!=len)
		{
			for(i=l-len-1;i>=0;i--)
			{
				x=(int)str[i]-48+c;
				if(x>9)
				{
					c=1;
					count++;
				}
				else
					c=0;
			}
		}
		if(count==0)
			cout<<"No carry operation.\n";
		else if(count==1)
			cout<<"1 carry operation.\n";
		else
			cout<<count<<" carry operations.\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
